name: ContextTest
description: Unit tests for the Context class, focusing on illegal and legal configurations of min and max children, and handling of null parameters.

test_cases.name: testContextIllegalMinChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that a RuntimeException is thrown when the minimum number of children is set to 0.

test_cases.name: testContextIllegalMaxChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that a RuntimeException is thrown when the maximum number of children is set to 2.

test_cases.name: testContextIllegalMinMaxChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that a RuntimeException is thrown when the minimum number of children is greater than the maximum number of children.

test_cases.name: testContextLegalChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that the Context constructor accepts legal values for min and max children.

test_cases.name: testContextSelectorNullThrowsNPE
test_cases.description: Tests that a NullPointerException is thrown when the selector parameter is null.

test_cases.name: testContextSplitterNullThrowsNPE
test_cases.description: Tests that a NullPointerException is thrown when the splitter parameter is null.

test_cases.name: testContextNodeFactoryNullThrowsNPE
test_cases.description: Tests that a NullPointerException is thrown when the node factory parameter is null.
